description: From Latin amātōrius (“pertaining to love or a lover”, adjective), from amātor (“a lover”), from amō (“I love”).

adjectives.description: amatory (comparative more amatory, superlative most amatory)

entries.meaning: Of or relating to love, especially sexual love.
examples: Eggs, oysters, too, are amatory food; / But who is their purveyor from above / Heaven knows  […]
